OrgName.entry: FRIENDS OF CHAPELTOWN AND HIGH GREEN PARKS

Desc.entry: Promotes the open spaces known as Chapeltown and High Green Parks for recreation, play and other leisure-time occupations. Works with the local authority and voluntary organisations to manage and maintain the parks. Involved in the protection, conservation and improvement of the environment of both parks and the preservation of buildings or sites of historic or architectural importance within the parks. Provides or assists in the provision of recreational facilities. Is also involved in the promotion of public safety and prevention of crime in the parks.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Please contact for days and times
Please contact for days and times
3rd Wed of alternate months, 3rd Thurs of alternate months 7-8pm, please contact for details
